welcome.mesageWelcome: Enter the Dashboard to see the Quicksight panels.
welcome.mesageWelcomeDemo2: Contact us to connect your Open edX® instance to PANORAMA® and start converting your data into actionable insights and strategic decisions.
welcome.mesageWelcomeDemo1: As a new user, you can experience the full power of PANORAMA® with an anonymized set of data, for testing purposes only.
welcome.infoPanorama: PANORAMA® is an analytics engine that allows organisations using Open edX™ to deliver online courses to create their own management dashboards.

profile.description1: - Domain upload can only be done once and cannot be edited later.
profile.description2: - The domain can contain the following extensions: .com, .org, .net, .gov, or .edu
profile.description3: - Do not enter 'https//:', only 'www.' name and extension, for example: 'www.aulasneo.com'
profile.description4: - If for some reason you want to change your domain, contact us

errors.errorExtentionDomain: Domain is not a valid domain with .com, .org, .net, .gov, or .edu extension
errors.errorValidation: There was an error in validation
